name: Mexican Cuisine
description: Enhance your culinary abilities with this complete course on Mexican cooking. Discover homestyle recipes of Mexico through this course by step guide. Perfect for seasoned cooks and novices alike, you'll find helpful videos and instructions that will easily teach even the most inexperienced cook.

name: Indian Cuisine
description: Are you ready to learn some Indian cuisine? It is common that not everyone is born with a knack to cook Indian food. That's why this dedicated course offers online videos, mobile apps and e-books, in addition to professional lessons all aimed at introducing you to the art of cooking Indian food.

name: Italian Cuisine
description: With flavors borrowed from different regions, Italian dishes are often very versatile and can be served as an appetizer, side dish, main course or even dessert. From Gnocchi Soups to Patate al forno and Baked Pasta, learn the true taste of Italian cuisine from this course.

name: Art of Dessert
description: Learn all of the tips, tricks, and best practices to make classic and contemporary desserts in this online course. From cakes and tarts, to puddings, parfaits and gelato there is nothing that this course can't handle. You will learn the fundamental techniques for all of your dessert needs.
